articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow and Oil Drop as Covid Fears Grip Europe While Tech Rises - Barron's
articles.description: Investors await news on who President Joe Biden will nominate as the next chair of the Federal Reserve. The news should come by Thanksgiving.
articles.content:
Technology stocks popped on Friday, while the 
Dow Jones Industrial Average
 fell and bond yields dipped alongside a new surge in Covid-19 cases. In midday trading, the Dow slid 174 points, or 0.5%… [+3174 chars]
